  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Channel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A Channel represents a bridge between two cells.

      • Channel

        public Channel(Tissue tissue,
       Location from,
       Location to,
       Player player)
        Constructs a Channel for a player between two locations.
        Parameters:
        from - - The location the bridge starts from
        to - - The location the bridge goes to
        player - - The current player making this bridge
